Description: Rim sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline and added red centres; top of rim glazed; exterior: band of vertical strokes at rim above dot and billet frieze between bands; below, large metopal maeander pattern; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.1.42)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0092) (phase 2)
